result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Ojhagi Trezon Crutcher
Current: 609 N State St, Merrill, WI 54452 United States  (Effective: 06-15-2016)
Prior: 710 Stark Street, Wausau, WI 54403 United States
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 11:39 am 
INCLUDES 15CM1496 AND 15CM1497. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person with Atty William Drengler.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 

State moves to: 
In 15CM1496: Ct. 1 (Receiving Stolen Property)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: In 15CM1497: Ct. 1 (Retail Theft)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Atty Drengler makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: $5 plus costs; DNA sample and surcharge. 
COURT finds the def may petition for expungement in 1 year if he is charged with no new crimes and has paid the fine and costs. 

Adj: 11:48 am
Plea/sentencing hearing at 12-08-2015 11:40 am

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 1:57 pm 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft now appears  - Atty William Drengler is NOT present. 
COURT notes deft appeared late for plea hearing as he thought plea was set for 2:15 pm 
COURT quashes warrant and vacates bond forfeiture and removes BFH date. 
COURT sets calendar call on 11/4/2015 at 1pm with Br. 3 JA to set plea hearing. 
Adj: 1:59 pm 

Deft's updated Address: 
119 River St. 
Wausau, WI 54403.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 1:24 pm 
INCLUDES 15CM1496 AND 15CM14967. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft does NOT appear - Atty William Drengler appears on his behalf. 
Date and time was set for plea hearing. 
Atty Drengler makes statement. 
COURT authorizes $1000 bench warrant and stays its issuance until 4:30 pm on 11/3/2015. 
COURT ORDERS bond be forefeited. 
BFH set for 11/24/2015 at 2:00 pm in Br. 3. 
Adj: 1:26 pm
